title.narrative: Nigeria Stability and Reconciliation Programme - Contract with Briish Council

description.narrative: This activity (Nigeria Stability and Reconciliation Programme - Contract with Briish Council) is a component of Nigeria Stability and Reconciliation Programme reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £28,599,453. This component benefits Nigeria, and works in the following sector(s): Security system management and reform, Civilian peace-building, conflict prevention and resolution, Reintegration and SALW control. , with the following implementing partners: British Council, Harewelle International Limited. The start date is 01-04-2010 and the end date is 30-09-2017.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA

sector.narrative: Civilian peace-building, conflict prevention and resolution
